name: Easter Bunny Hop DVD
description: Its finally here - the Easter Bunny Hop Competition DVD 2008. This event/DVD was and is to help raise money for Candlelighters Childrens Cancer Charity, so dig deep people and grab a copy. The DVD features the main competition event including some 50 plus riders ( including - John Shrewsbury, Patrick Donovan, Chris Walker, Sam & Tom Oliver, Danny & Tom Swindlehurst, Andrew Walker, Ben Savage, Wayne Mahomet, Danny Smith, Tom Buck and Ben Ryan to name just a few ), a demo by 10 times World Biketrial Champion Cesar Canas, Ben Savage and Wayne Mahomet, the Bunny Hop Competition and a Cesar Canas clips compilation video. Too see a trailer of this DVD head over to our vimeo page here.
